official_languages: ''None''  The Mauritian constitution makes no mention of an official language. The Constitution only mentions that the official language of the National Assembly is English; however, any member can also address the chair in French.
languages: ''None''  The Mauritian constitution makes no mention of an official language. The Constitution only mentions that the official language of the National Assembly is English; however, any member can also address the chair in French.   | languages_type                = Vernacular languages  The mother tongue of Mauritians as per 2011 Census.
